content.question: In line 3, progenies magnum caeli ventura sub axem is translated

choices.label: the offspring felt the winds beneath the axis of the great sky
the offspring are about to come beneath the great axis of the sky
the great offspring are said to be coming beneath the axis of the sky
things are about to come for the offspring beneath the great axis of the sky

content.answer: the offspring are about to come beneath the great axis of the sky

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
